description:
A 22 yr old Full Stack Developer. I Quit my job to build something really cool. Rather then making something for someone else why not make somthing of your own. 
 I have gone through the same process of creating a landing page every time I start a new project. So I decided to build a boilerplate that will help me and others to build a landing page in hours not days. 
 Now I can validate my ideas first by building a landing page and then start working on the product. You can take advantage too. Get started now!
shortText:
Created a landing page 
 in 5 minutes
